snippet: Bustling with productivity, the Red Horse Market attracts celebrities like Martha Stewart, Alec Baldwin and the Kardashians, and its patrons are a devoted lot.
abstract: Neighborhood Joint column on Red Horse Market, East Hampton shop known for stocking high quality food from local producers, including fresh mozzarella cheese, and for its attentive service.
lead_paragraph: Bustling with productivity, the Red Horse Market attracts celebrities like Martha Stewart, Alec Baldwin and the Kardashians, and its patrons are a devoted lot.

headline.main: Mozzarella for Big Cheeses at an East Hampton Market

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Red Horse Market (East Hampton, NY, Retailer)
